summary: Adds a light armour version of dwarven armor with the same stats as elven armor. Can be created using regular dwarven armour at a forge.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a light armour version of dwarven armor with the same stats as elven armor. Can be created using regular dwarven armour at a forge.

01000D6E ArmorDwarvenGauntletsDUPLICATE001 (Gauntlets)
01000D6A ArmorDwarvenHelmetDUPLICATE001 (Helmet)
01000D72 ArmorDwarvenShieldDUPLICATE001 (Shield)
01000D67 ArmorDwarvenBootsDUPLICATE001 (Boots)
01000D63 ArmorDwarvenCuirassDUPLICATE001 (Armor)
